title: Lenovo expands AI lineup with Nvidia gigafactory tie-up, Qira platform
description: China's Lenovo unveiled an artificial intelligence cloud gigafactory with Nvidia at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on Tuesday, while also showcasing a slew of other products, including a...
content:
Jan 6 (Reuters) - China's Lenovo unveiled an artificial intelligence cloud gigafactory with Nvidia at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on Tuesday, while also showcasing a slew of other products, including a new AI platform.

title: The best (and weirdest) tech at CES 2026
description: The Consumer Electronics Show is a place where robots roam free, TVs tower over footsore onlookers, and artificial intelligence lurks around every corner.
content:
Here’s what has stood out from the crowd so far.
The ride-booking giant’s road to robotaxis has been a complicated one: An early Uber self-driving test vehicle killed a pedestrian in 2018. The company sold off its autonomous driving project in 2020 a... [4554 chars]

title: Elon Musk’s xAI raises $20 billion to expand data centers and research
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI has raised $20 billion from investors, a funding round that could value the company above $230 billion and deepen the intensifying race to build the world’s most powerful AI systems.
content:
The company said it would use the funding to “expand its decisive compute advantage” as it built data centers to power its technology and to “fuel groundbreaking research.”
The funding is part of a frenzy over AI companies, with investors plowing eno... [2116 chars]

title: Strengthening Ties: China-Ireland Trade Talks Aim for New Horizons
description: During Irish Prime Minister Micheál Martin's visit to China, discussions focused on broadening trade cooperation in sectors like aircraft leasing, healthcare, green energy, and artificial intelligence. Despite evasive agriculture discussion, Ireland seeks China's market reopening for beef exports to boost its economic ties amidst strained China-EU relations.
content: In a strategic move to enhance economic collaboration, Chinese Premier Li Qiang and Irish Prime Minister Micheál Martin met in Beijing. Their talks, held as part of Martin's five-day diplomatic mission, aimed to deepen trade relations across various ... [683 chars]

title: Asian stock rally eases as Japan slips, oil falls
description: Asian markets took a break Wednesday after a strong start to the year. Japanese stocks dipped due to rising tensions with China. Meanwhile, US markets reached new record highs. Optimism around artificial intelligence and expectations of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts are driving investor sentiment. Investors are also watching upcoming economic data releases.
content:

title: Lenovo Debuts Qira AI Platform and Concept Devices at CES
description: Lenovo Group Ltd. unveiled a new artificial intelligence platform and several proof-of-concept devices, an attempt by the world’s best-selling PC maker to show it can be a serious player in AI.
content:
Lenovo Group Ltd. unveiled a new artificial intelligence platform and several proof-of-concept devices, an attempt by the world’s best-selling PC maker to show it can be a serious player in AI.

title: Asian Stock Rally Pauses as Japan Slips on China Tensions, Oil Falls
description: Asian Stock Markets took a breather from their best-ever yearly start as geopolitical tensions between China and Japan weighed on sentiment, with new export controls escalating bilateral pressure. Despite regional headwinds, global markets remained buoyant with US stocks reaching new highs, supported by artificial intelligence momentum from CES and expectations of favorable economic data.
content: Asian Stock Markets paused their record-breaking rally Wednesday, with Japanese equities leading declines amid rising geopolitical tensions with China. The Nikkei 225 Index fell 0.40% at the open, pushing the broader MSCI Asia Pacific Index lower aft... [9083 chars]

title: Hyundai to deploy AI-powered humanoid robots at Georgia auto factory
description: Korean automaker Hyundai and its subsidiary, Boston Dynamics, unveil a sweeping artificial intelligence robotics strategy at the CES trade show Monday in Las Vegas.
content:
Korean auto giant plans to use humanoid robots at its Georgia factory starting in 2028.
